Body:
cube = Cube((4, 5, 3))
x, y, z = cube.get_absolute_coordinates(side, i, j)
assert x == a
assert y == b
assert z == c
pytest.mark.parametrize('side, i, j, a, b, c', [(Side.FRONT, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0),
    (Side.FRONT, 1, 3, 3, 1, 0), (Side.LEFT, 2, 3, 0, 2, 1), (Side.RIGHT, 0,
    1, 3, 0, 1), (Side.TOP, 3, 2, 2, 0, 1), (Side.BOTTOM, 3, 1, 1, 2, 3), (
    Side.BACK, 1, 1, 2, 1, 4)])
